name: app-mkdocs-extra
description: Generate mkdocs extra code and insert files.

scripts.install:next: esbuild index.js --bundle --outfile=./../../apps/mkdocs/docs/extra/index.js --format=esm --target=es2021 --minify && pnpm shx cp index.css ./../../apps/mkdocs/docs/extra/index.css
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:install
